nodes.text: Portrait of the Emperor was a painting that depicted the Galactic Emperor Palpatine. The painting depicts him smiling sadistically as he "holds" two planets and a moon on his left hand, with his index finger discharging Force lightning on the orange planet.

The painting was given out, alongside A Rebel Painting, to players who attended the 2006 SWG Fanfest, with players having to choose between the two. Since Star Wars Galaxy's 10th Game Update, it alongside A Rebel Painting have been declared to be shared no trade items.
